long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace a smarter way to interact on Debank with our extension, boasting two key features:

1. Effortless Lucky Draw Participation:
Say goodbye to manual entries: Automate your lucky draw participation by simply providing a list of draw URLs. The extension takes care of the rest, instantly joining you in all listed draws.
Increase your chances of winning exciting prizes with automatic enrollment.


2. Customize and Automate Your Trusts:
Targeted Trust Automation: Create customizable tasks to automate trusts posts based on specific criteria. Fine-tune your trusts by defining parameters such as number of trusts, target profiles, search terms, and more.

Boost Engagement Across Feeds: Effortlessly engage with content on your followed accounts, hot feed, specific profile streams, and even searches. Reach a broader audience and tailor your interactions to suit your individual needs.

Save Time and Effort: 
Our extension simplifies social media engagement, freeing you from repetitive tasks.

Increase Reach and Visibility: 
Expand your reach by automatically trust relevant posts, attracting attention and enhancing your online presence.
